item.title: Detecting malicious scripts and connections
item.description: Detecting malicious scripts and connectionsPage Shield implements different mechanisms to determine if a script, or a connection made by a script, is malicious. These mechanisms are: Malicious URL checks Malicious domain checks Malicious script detection Any updates to the threat feeds will trigger new checks for previously detected scripts or connections so that the Page Shield dashboards always reflect the latest categorization. This feature is available as a paid add-on for customers on an Enterprise plan.
